energy-kcal_100g.note: Very high energy density food (WHO, FSSAI)

sugars_100g.note: Free sugars should be <10% of total energy intake (WHO). <5% is ideal.

fat_100g.note: Total fat >35% energy is not recommended (USDA, WHO).

saturated-fat_100g.note: WHO recommends <10% of calories from saturated fat.

trans-fat_100g.note: WHO: eliminate industrial trans fats, <1% of energy intake.

salt_100g.note: FSSAI: adults should consume <5 g/day salt (~2 g sodium).

sodium_100g.note: Equivalent to ~1.5 g salt per 100 g.

proteins_100g.note: Higher protein contributes to satiety and muscle maintenance.

vitamin-c_100g.note: Encourage Vitamin C intake for immunity & antioxidant benefits.

calcium_100g.note: Dairy & fortified foods should provide calcium (RDA ~1000 mg/day).

iron_100g.note: Iron fortification recommended to prevent anemia.
